screensaver.name: hufo_smoke
screensaver._description:
Smoke particles billowing through a 3D warping grid.
Specify colors using hex color codes (ie, ff0000, 00ff00, 0000ff for red, green and blue.)
Written by Jeremie Allard <hufo at planet-d.net>. Ported to Linux by Tugrul Galatali - <http://rss-glx.sourceforge.net/>.
